name: Chess Tac Toe
description:
Play Chess and Tic Tac Toe at the same time! (kind of)

Connect multiple Tic Tac Toe pieces and promote them to Chess pieces. Move them around the board and capture your opponent's king.

Play versus AI or up to 3 other players in a couch co-op (speaking of AI, don't expect too much, my little bots are still children).

Use mouse and ESC to navigate through menus, space to skip the turn (skipping turns is not an intended way to play this game, I had to implement it, because there are no mechanisms to check whether there are any available moves left).

Made for Minimalistic Jam 3
